sentences.sContent: Mr White likes chatting up the girls.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mr White likes chatting up the girls.
sentences.sCn: 怀特先生喜欢跟姑娘们搭讪。

sentences.sContent: This gave Mr White an opportunity of collecting his thoughts.
sentences.sContent_eng: This gave Mr White an opportunity of collecting his thoughts.
sentences.sCn: 这就给怀特先生一个使思想集中起来的机会。

sentences.sContent: Mr Brown and his wife corresponded for many years before they met.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mr Brown and his wife corresponded for many years before they met.
sentences.sCn: 布朗先生与妻子在相识以前先通信了好多年。

phrases.pCn: 白马王子；如意郎君；对先生；理想的丈夫
